name: FMP plat-former
description:
My game is a jumping puzzle map that will be interactive to the player and this will be a large map with lots of different jumping puzzles. 

dystoniaen future where you are a smuggler that has to navigate a wide assortment of buildings to achieve your goal. Battle over challenging puzzles and overcome the evil regime one package at a time. Good luck smuggler.           

DEVLOG - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Bt7VvcFe_pQ1k4ISsXBtWxztQlmrOvRtVtyzqrV78Uw/
